Episodes.Title: War
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Joe Biden, Jim Binns
Episodes.Plot: Jon discusses the issue of 'burn holes' with a panel of those affected by them.

Episodes.Title: The Problem with Freedom
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Rob Christensen, Tim Gunn, Gábor Halmai
Episodes.Plot: Americans love freedom. But what price are they willing to pay for it--and what can be learned from other countries that are fighting to be free?

Episodes.Title: The Problem with The Economy
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Brinda Adhikari, Jason Alexander, Reniqua Allen
Episodes.Plot: Many U.S. politicians praise working-class Americans for their work ethic and resilience. But why is so little done to help them succeed?

Episodes.Title: The Problem with Guns
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Reniqua Allen, David Chipman, Terrence Cunningham
Episodes.Plot: Shootings in America are an epidemic. Many agree that bad guys shouldn't have gun access, but how do we decide who the bad guys are?

Episodes.Title: Stock Market
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Brinda Adhikari, J. Brown, Erin Burnett
Episodes.Plot: The rise of e-brokers was meant to democratize the stock market - yet the inequality in the market has actually worsened. How can it be fixed?

Episodes.Title: Climate Change
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Ed Begley Jr., Hayden Carson Begley
Episodes.Plot: We're being told that our planet Earth is headed towards catastrophe if we don't fix climate change. What will it take for everyone to change their behavior?

Episodes.Title: Media
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Jim Acosta, Brinda Adhikari
Episodes.Plot: Cable news positions itself as a safeguard of freedom and democracy. But is that undermined by the ratings driven ploys to keep people watching?

Episodes.Title: Racism
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, James Baldwin, Wolf Blitzer
Episodes.Plot: No matter how sincerely some white people want to educate themselves and take action against racism, white comfort seems to block progress.
